channel.title: Sean vigue fitness
channel.description:
Features world class Yoga, Pilates and core workouts with personal training and fun bootcamps from central Florida’s premier fitness instructor - Sean Vigue. Find eating tips and the most current health and fitness news. Videos updated weekly.
Check out my award winning Pilates for Men workout on my website.
www.seanviguefitness.com www.facebook.com/seanvigue

item.title: Yoga for Runners - Exercises to Improve Flexibility & Strength
item.description:

item.title: 20 minute Gladiator Workout! *Bodyweight Only*
item.description:
Enjoy this workout inspired by some of my favorite action films ie. Gladiator, Troy, 300, and Conan.
Exercises (do each for 30 seconds)
Door Hinge Hovers
Flying Free Burpees
Super Slow T-Stand Push-Ups
Mountain Climbers
Rest for 1 minute and repeat for 20 minutes.
facebook.com/seanvigue
seanviguefitness.com
Please rate 5 stars and comment.
Thanks!

item.title: 4 minute Insane Cardio/Core Workout at Home - Exercises for Ripped Beachbody
item.description:
Got 4 minutes? Try this insane full body workout that will leave you stronger, ripped, and with more endurance.
Tabata workout = 4 minutes - 20 seconds exercise followed by 10 seconds rest. Repeat for 4 minutes.
Follow Sean Vigue!
facebook.com/seanvigue
seanviguefitness.com

item.title: Voice lessons/Workout for Singers - Exercises for better Singing
item.description:
To be a great singer you have to take care of your entire body - not just your voice. Your body is your instrument and here are a bunch of exercises that will give you a stronger core, better flexibility, deeper breath, and more focus. I love to sing and I want you to be able to do it for many, many years :)
facebook.com/seanvigue
seanviguefitness.com

item.title: Welcome to my Podcast
item.description:
My friend,
Welcome to my brand new weekly workout Podcast. Here is a short intro to let you know what to expect as we undertake this exciting fitness journey. It’s great to have you on board - now let’s transform our bodies.
All the best,
Sean Vigue
